context: Page: Chessington World of Adventures | Section: Flat rides | Source: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chessington_World_of_Adventures
questions: What ride opened in 2010 and what area was it put into?

table: Swinging pirate ship that is painted black (hence the name).
Riders sit in a motorcycle-like position in outward-facing seats at the edge of the circular ride platform.
A large monkey-themed wave swinger ride with a water element. Originally opened as Billy's Whizzer.
Top Spin with a water element, and the first to feature its staple 'drown-upside-down'. Its opening year of 1995 saw 2.1 million visitors, the highest in the park's history.
A Mack SeaStorm ride. Riders sit in a boat that rises up and down, simulating a sea storm.
